_comment: Enemy definitions. Spawn weights determine frequency in waves. Only enemies with existing scenes are listed here.

drone.name: Drone
drone.description: Basic enemy that chases the player

shipping_freighter.name: Intergalactic Shipping Freighter
shipping_freighter.description: A lumbering cargo freighter loaded with XP. Chases until hit, then flees. Kill it for a jackpot of XP and stardust.

armored_freighter.name: Intergalactic Armored Freighter
armored_freighter.description: A heavily armored vault ship carrying credits. Chases until hit, then flees. Kill it for a jackpot of credits and stardust.
